pages.text: Chalk is used to draw pentacle runes and define the pentacle shape. Different types of chalk are used for different purposes, as outlined on the next pages. The different runes are purely decorative. $(bold)Repeatedly$() use chalk on a block to switch to a different rune. Using a $(item)Brush$() is the easiest way to $(bold)remove$() chalk runes that have been incorrectly placed.
White chalk is the most basic type of ritual chalk and is found in most pentacles. It has no special power beyond defining the shape of the pentacle.

Golden chalk is used for binding runes, which allow to infuse a spirit into an item, or make it possess a living being.

Red chalk is used to call on the most powerful and dangerous beings, such as $(thing)Marid$(). $(l:rituals/summoning/afrit_essence)Afrit Essence$(/l) is required to craft red chalk.
